about_the_game:
Co-op horror extraction shooter.
Explore abandoned buildings and hear the screams of a friend being choked by a monster. Crawl deeper into the unknown, fire into the darkness, send teammates to bait enemies, check every corner for supplies, and feel the rush from a successful extraction.


The Importance of Teamwork.
Working together is crucial as you and your friends navigate dangerous environments, using voice chat to stay connected and coordinate your actions. Whether guiding from afar or tackling challenges together, communication ensures survival. Utilize tools like walkie-talkies and traps to outsmart threats and keep your crew safe.


The Power of Scavenging.
Scavenge for valuable items, evacuate your finds, and transform them into powerful upgrades that will enhance your character's abilities. Customize and improve your gear to match your playstyle, sell surplus items for profit, and grow your arsenal as you conquer new challenges. Every item you collect can be the key to becoming stronger, smarter, and wealthier in the dangerous world of Joint Recall.
